components.description:
Zero Width Joiner (ZWJ) is a Unicode character that joins two or more other characters together in sequence to create a new emoji.

Zero Width Joiner, pronounced "zwidge", is not an emoji and has no appearance by itself. This is an invisible character when used alone.

View Emoji ZWJ Sequences that use this character.
components.title: Zero Width Joiner

components.description:
A microphone, used to amplify a person’s voice when speaking or singing.

Previously shown with music notes on most platforms, implying it to be used for a singer / singing. Today only Twitter's design retains these notes.
components.title: Microphone

description:
A woman singer or rock star generally displayed with a microphone, and sometimes musical notes.

iOS and Android display this emoji as a Bowie-esque figure while WhatsApp appears heavily inspired by Prince.
title: Woman Singer

emoji_net_data.definition: The Woman Singer emoji is a sequence of the ?? Woman and ?? Microphone emojis. These are combined using a zero width joiner between each cha http://emojipedia.org/female-singer/
emoji_net_data.name: woman singer

bn:00105808a: Indicating the most important performer or role

bn:00071731n: Person who sings, is able to sing, or earns a living by singing.
A singer; a person who likes to sing.
A person who sings, is able to sing, or earns a living by singing.

bn:00001530n: A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)

bn:00031012n: A person who tries or whose job is to please, entertain or amuse.
A person who tries to please or amuse

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the woman singer emoji is captured in a moment of passionate performance, often with a microphone held close and a subtle expression of vocalization. Apple‚Äôs glossy 3D shading gives her attire and the microphone a polished, vibrant appearance, while soft gradients and realistic lighting highlight her dynamic pose. This emoji embodies artistry, music, performance, and the joy of singing, frequently used when discussing concerts, karaoke, or musical talents.
